timeline.message:
Fix ToggleableKeyBinding differences to vanilla.
A ToggleableKeyBinding can be active (isKeyDown) even when it's conflict context or modifier are not active. Instead those must be checked when the toggle happens

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be public or protected or something given it is in a class and not an interface (if default even works in ATs in interfaces, no idea)
timeline.author: pupnewfster

replies.bodyText: The access you want is protected, so that the subclass ToggleableKeyBinding can access it, but others cant.
